trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface for creating new Web site user accounts.
trans-unit.target: Gir et brukergrensesnitt for oppretting av nye brukerkontoer for webområdet.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#Introduction) - [Creating a User](#creating_a_user) - [Styles and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [Validation Grouping](#validation_grouping) - [Formatting Using Layout Templates](#formatting_using_layout_templates) - [Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduction The CreateUserWizard control provides the user interface for the object that communicates with your Web site's user data store to create new user accounts in the data store.
trans-unit.target: I dette emnet:- [Introduksjon](#Introduction) - [oppretting av en bruker](#creating_a_user) - [stiler og maler](#styles_and_templates) - [validering gruppering](#validation_grouping) - [formatering ved hjelp av oppsettet maler](#formatting_using_layout_templates) - [tilgjengelighet](#Accessibility) - [deklarerende syntaksen](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## innføring i CreateUserWizard kontrollen gir brukergrensesnittet for det objektet som kommuniserer med til webområdet bruker datalageret til å opprette nye brukerkontoer i datalageret.

trans-unit.source: The CreateUserWizard relies on the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> to create the user and disable them if necessary.
trans-unit.target: CreateUserWizard avhengig av <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>Opprett brukeren for å deaktivere dem om nødvendig.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are not familiar with ASP.NET login controls, you might find it helpful to read [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) before continuing.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du ikke kjenner med ASP.NET påloggingen kontroller, kan det være lurt å lese [ASP.NET påloggingen Kontroller oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) før du fortsetter.

trans-unit.source: For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: En liste med andre emner som er relatert til pålogging kontroller og medlemskap, kan du se [styre brukere ved hjelp av medlemskap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: By default, the CreateUserWizard control will accept a user name and password from the Web site visitor.
trans-unit.target: Som standard godtar CreateUserWizard-kontroll brukernavn og passord fra Web besøkende.

trans-unit.source: Based on the requirements of the site's <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> object, the CreateUserWizard control will optionally accept an e-mail address, represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> property, and a password recovery confirmation question and answer, represented by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Basert på kravene til områdets <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>objektet, CreateUserWizard kontrollen eventuelt godtar en e-postadresse som representeres av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>egenskapen og et passord gjenoppretting bekreftelse spørsmål og svar, representert av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: For a table showing all required and optional controls for CreateUserWizard, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>.
trans-unit.target: En tabell som viser alle nødvendige og valgfrie kontroller for CreateUserWizard, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A> is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> property is set in the application's Web.config file, you could potentially generate a password that does not pass the regular expression strength test.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>er satt til `true` og den <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>er satt i programmets Web.config-filen, du kan generere et passord som ikke sender RegEx krypteringsstyrke test. potensielt</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, creating a user raises an error that indicates an invalid password.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet opphøyer oppretter en bruker feilmeldingen som angir et ugyldig passord.

trans-unit.source: ## Creating a User When a user is created with the CreateUserWizard, the control interacts with the current to accomplish the following tasks in order.
trans-unit.target: ## For å opprette en bruker når en bruker er opprettet med CreateUserWizard, kontrollen samhandler med gjeldende til å utføre de følgende i rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: Create a password if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Opprett et passord hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>

trans-unit.source: Create the user in the data store that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> represents.
trans-unit.target: Opprett brukeren i datakilden som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>representerer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: Disable the user in the store if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A> property is set to `true.` You can extend the CreateUserWizard control to accept additional information by adding additional fields, or by adding additional steps before or after the provided templates in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Deaktiver brukeren i butikken hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A>er satt til `true.` du kan utvide CreateUserWizard-kontroll for å godta mer informasjon ved å legge til flere felt, eller legge til flere trinn før eller etter de angitte malene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> step is the first step within the CreateUserWizard control, and is a required step.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep>trinn er det første trinnet i CreateUserWizard-kontroll og kreves.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A> property is set to `false` to keep the user from returning to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> step and accidentally attempting to create another user account with the same credentials.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A>er satt til `false` hindre at brukeren gå tilbake til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep>trinn og ved et uhell forsøk på å opprette en annen brukerkonto med legitimasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A> property is not maintained in view state and you must include logic in your application to maintain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>er satt til `false`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A>egenskapen ikke beholdes i visningen tilstand, og du må inkludere logic i programmet for å beholde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep.AllowReturn%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: CreateUserWizard control properties represented by text boxes, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>, are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper for kontroll av CreateUserWizard representert av tekstbokser, slik som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>, er tilgjengelige alle faser av siden levetid.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged> event raised by the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen trer eventuelle endringer som gjøres av sluttbrukeren ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>hendelsen som opprettes av tekstboksene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>

trans-unit.source: The CreateUserWizard control can optionally send e-mail messages to new users if you have configured an SMTP mail server to send e-mail.
trans-unit.target: CreateUserWizard-kontroll kan eventuelt sende e-postmeldinger til nye brukere hvis du har konfigurert en SMTP-serveren for å sende e-post.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The CreateUserWizard control uses Internet e-mail services to send login information to users.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For CreateUserWizard kontrollen bruker e-posttjenesten sende påloggingsinformasjonen til brukere.

trans-unit.source: There are inherent security risks with sending passwords in e-mail.
trans-unit.target: Det er innebygd sikkerhetsproblemer med sender passord i e-post.

trans-unit.source: You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site.
trans-unit.target: Du skal fastslå om disse sikkerhetsrisiko godtas på området.

trans-unit.source: ## Styles and Templates When the CreateUserWizard control is not customized with templates, the property of the CreateUserWizard control applies to the first text box in the control and the property, which is applied to all text boxes of the control.
trans-unit.target: ## Stiler og maler når det CreateUserWizard-kontroll er ikke tilpasset med maler, den kontrollens CreateUserWizard gjelder den første tekstboksen kontrollens og egenskap, som brukes på alle tekstbokser kontrollens.

trans-unit.source: If the CreateUserWizard control is customized with templates, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis CreateUserWizard-kontroll er tilpasset med maler, og deretter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>egenskapen og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>egenskapen ignoreres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, directly set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> property of each template child control.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet direkte angitt av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>egenskapen og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A>for hver mal underordnet verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.TabIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: CreateUserWizard control properties represented by text boxes, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A>, are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper for kontroll av CreateUserWizard representert av tekstbokser, slik som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A>, er tilgjengelige alle faser av siden levetid.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged> event raised by the text boxes.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen trer eventuelle endringer som gjøres av sluttbrukeren ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>hendelsen som opprettes av tekstboksene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> property recreates the child controls of the CreateUserWizard control, and their control state is lost in the process.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Innstillingen av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>egenskapen gjenoppretter underordnede kontroller kontrollens CreateUserWizard, og den kontroll tilstanden går tapt i prosessen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AutoGeneratePassword%2A>

trans-unit.source: To avoid this situation, explicitly maintain the control state of the CreateUserWizard control's child controls, or avoid putting controls inside of templates.
trans-unit.target: Du kan unngå denne situasjonen ved eksplisitt opprettholde kontrollen tilstanden til CreateUserWizard kontrollens underordnede kontroller, eller unngå Kontroller inne i maler.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the CreateUserWizard control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser CreateUserWizard kontroll-stilegenskaper og forklarer som UI-elementet som påvirker hver stilegenskap.

trans-unit.source: For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: En liste over hvilke egenskaper hver gjelder, kan du se dokumentasjonen for individuelle stilegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: |Style property|UI element affected| |--------------------|-------------------------| ||**Continue** button.| ||**Create User** button.| ||Links to other pages.| ||Instructional text on the page that tells users how to use the control.| ||Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| ||Text entry input fields.| ||Title text for each view.| ||Text displayed to the user when the password recovery or reset attempt is successful.| ||Error messages when the membership provider fails to create a new user account.| ||The text that describes password requirements.| ||Error messages associated with validation.| ## Validation Grouping The CreateUserWizard control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the CreateUserWizard control can be validated separately.
trans-unit.target: | Style-egenskapen | UI-elementet berørt | |--------------------|-------------------------| | | **Fortsett** knappen. | | | **Opprett bruker** knappen. | | | Koblinger til andre sider. | | | Teksten på siden som beskriver hvordan du bruker kontrollen. | | | Etikettene for alle inndata felt, for eksempel tekstbokser. | | | Teksten inndata felt. | | | Title teksten for hver enkelt visning. | | | Tekst som vises for brukeren når passord gjenoppretting eller reset forsøket er fullført. | | | Feilmeldinger når Medlemskapsleverandøren kan ikke opprette en ny konto. | | | Teksten som beskriver passordkravene. | | | Feilmeldinger som er knyttet til validering. | ## Validering gruppering i CreateUserWizard kontrollen bruker en valideringsgruppe slik at andre felt på samme side som CreateUserWizard-kontroll kan valideres separat.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the CreateUserWizard control is used as the name of the validation group.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>egenskapen kontrollens CreateUserWizard brukes som navnet på valideringsgruppen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, a CreateUserWizard control with the ID "CreateUserWizard1" will use a validation group name of "CreateUserWizard1".
trans-unit.target: En CreateUserWizard-kontroll med ID "CreateUserWizard1" vil for eksempel bruke et navn på validering av "CreateUserWizard1".

trans-unit.source: If you want to set the validation group that the CreateUserWizard control is part of, you must template the control and change the validation group name.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi valideringsgruppen CreateUserWizard-kontroll er en del av, må malen kontrollen og endre navnet på validering.

trans-unit.source: Note that the CreateUserWizard class inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> class, which does not support special Microsoft Internet Explorer rendering for non-standard or quirks mode.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at CreateUserWizard klassen arver fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>klasse som ikke støtter spesielle Microsoft Internet Explorer-gjengivelse for ikke-standard eller quirks modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: The CreateUserWizard does not attempt to optimize rendering for non-standard Internet Explorer mode.
trans-unit.target: CreateUserWizard prøver ikke til å optimalisere gjengivelse for ikke-standard Internet Explorer-modus.

trans-unit.source: To get the best Internet Explorer rendering using the CreateUserWizard control, use the XHTML doc type, which is added by default in Visual Web Developer and Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Du får den beste gjengivelsen av Internet Explorer ved hjelp av CreateUserWizard-kontroll ved bruk av XHTML doc, som er lagt til som standard i Visual Web Developer og Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: ## Formatting Using Layout Templates The CreateUserWizard control lets you specify the layout of the control without requiring you to use an HTML `table` element.
trans-unit.target: ## Formatering bruker oppsettet maler CreateUserWizard kontroll lar deg angi oppsettet for kontrollen uten at du må bruke et HTML `table` elementet.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can use a `LayoutTemplate` element to specify the layout.
trans-unit.target: I stedet, kan du bruke en `LayoutTemplate` elementet til å angi oppsettet.

trans-unit.source: In the layout template, you create placeholder controls to indicate where items should be dynamically inserted into the control.
trans-unit.target: I oppsettsmalen opprette plassholder kontroller for å angi hvor elementer som skal settes dynamisk i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: (This is similar to how the template model for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control works.) For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: (Dette er lik hvordan malen modellen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>fungerer tilgangskontroll.)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ## Tilgjengelighet For informasjon om hvordan du konfigurerer denne kontrollen, slik at den genererer markup som overholder tilgjengelighet standarder se [tilgjengelighet i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ```
trans-unit.target: ## Deklarerende syntaks.```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the step that is currently displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir trinn som vises for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveStepIndex property provides the zero-based index of the step that is currently displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ActiveStepIndex gir den nullbaserte indeksen for trinn som vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically set the ActiveStepIndex property to dynamically display a step to the user.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen ActiveStepIndex skal vises dynamisk et trinn brukeren programmatisk.

trans-unit.source: The index of the step that is currently displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for trinn som vises for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end user's answer to the password recovery confirmation question.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir sluttbrukerens svaret passordspørsmålet for gjenoppretting bekreftelse.

trans-unit.source: The membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property will determine whether the question and answer text boxes are displayed at run time.
trans-unit.target: Leverandøren av medlemskapet som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>bestemme om tekstbokser spørsmål og svar vises på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an answer is required by the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property, then the answer text box will appear on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et svar kreves av leverandøren av medlemskapet som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>egenskapen og tekstboksen svar vises på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each text box displayed on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Hver tekstboks vises på <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontrollen har et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>objekt som er tilknyttet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to automatically generate a password for the new user account.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvorvidt automatisk generering av et passord for den nye brukerkontoen.

trans-unit.source: The AutoGeneratePassword property makes it possible to create user accounts without entering a password for them.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen AutoGeneratePassword gjør det mulig å opprette brukerkontoer uten å skrive inn et passord for dem.

trans-unit.source: For example, this functionality is useful when an administrator creates a new user's account and then gives a password to the user.
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonaliteten er for eksempel nyttig når en administrator oppretter en ny bruker konto og gir et passord for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > You cannot create users using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> if AutoGeneratePassword is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> property is set in the application's Web.config.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Du kan ikke opprette brukere ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>Hvis AutoGeneratePassword er satt til `true` og <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>er angitt i programmets Web.config.</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: An error message indicating an invalid password will result.
trans-unit.target: Vil føre til en feilmelding om et ugyldig passord.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to automatically generate a password for the new user account; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>automatisk generering av et passord for den nye brukerkontoen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the final user account creation step.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til endelig bruker kontoen oppretting trinn.

trans-unit.source: The CompleteStep property defines the final step for creating a user account.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CompleteStep definerer det siste trinnet for å opprette en brukerkonto.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompleteWizardStep> object that CompleteStep returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompleteWizardStep>-objekt som returnerer CompleteStep.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompleteWizardStep>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompleteWizardStep"></xref> object that represents the final user account creation step.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompleteWizardStep"> </xref> objektet som representerer siste bruker kontoen oppretting trinn.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som vises når en brukerkonto for webområdet er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Use the CompleteSuccessText property to change the message that is displayed when a user account is successfully created.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CompleteSuccessText-egenskapen til å endre meldingen som vises når en brukerkonto er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: The text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som vises når en brukerkonto for webområdet er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The default is "Your account has been successfully created."
trans-unit.target: Standard er "kontoen ble opprettet."

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: Standardteksten for kontrollen er lokalisert basert på gjeldende nasjonale innstillinger for serveren.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of the text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en samling med egenskaper som definerer utseendet til tekst som vises når en brukerkonto for webområdet er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The CompleteSuccessTextStyle defines the appearance of the text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: CompleteSuccessTextStyle definerer utseendet til tekst som vises når en brukerkonto for webområdet opprettes er i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet som returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `CompleteSuccessTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi disse egenskapene deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` representerer en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>klasse (for eksempel `CompleteSuccessTextStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CompleteSuccessTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `CompleteSuccessTextStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: The CompleteSuccessTextStyle property defines the appearance of the text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully, after the user has clicked the **Continue** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A> step.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CompleteSuccessTextStyle definerer utseendet til tekst som vises når en brukerkonto for webområdet er opprettet, etter at brukeren har trykket den **Fortsett** -knappen på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>trinn.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the CompleteSuccessTextStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Stilinnstillingene for egenskapen CompleteSuccessTextStyle skal slås sammen med stilinnstillingene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the CompleteSuccessTextStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Innstillinger brukes i egenskapen CompleteSuccessTextStyle overstyrer tilsvarende i egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by CompleteSuccessTextStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the CompleteSuccessTextStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Følgende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>stilegenskaper overstyres av CompleteSuccessTextStyle innstillinger:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>imidlertid når du bruker maler for utseendet til å definere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll, CompleteSuccessTextStyle egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains properties that define the appearance of the text displayed when a Web site user account is created successfully.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som inneholder egenskaper som definerer utseendet til tekst som vises når en brukerkonto for webområdet er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the second password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: Henter andre passord ble angitt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The ConfirmPassword property contains the second password (the confirmation password) entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ConfirmPassword inneholder andre passordet (Bekreft passord) angitt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator> object is provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A> and ConfirmPassword text box values.
trans-unit.target: Som standard en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>-objektet i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A>og ConfirmPassword for tekstverdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>

trans-unit.source: Each text box displayed on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control also has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Hver tekstboks vises på <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontrollen også har en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>tilknyttet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.target: Andre passord ble angitt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the **Continue** button in the final user account creation step.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren klikker den **Fortsett** -knappen i endelig bruker kontoen oppretting trinn.

trans-unit.source: The ContinueButtonClick event is raised when the **Continue** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: ContinueButtonClick denne hendelsen oppstår når den **Fortsett** -knappen på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Use the ContinueButtonClick event to provide additional processing when the **Continue** button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ContinueButtonClick hendelsen til å angi ytterligere behandling når den **Fortsett** -knappen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName*> value of the **Continue** button on the final step for creating a user account.
trans-unit.target: Representerer den <> </> *> verdien for den * *Fortsett**-knappen på det siste trinnet for å opprette en brukerkonto.

trans-unit.source: The ContinueButtonCommandName field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: ContinueButtonCommandName feltet er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: The ContinueButtonCommandName field represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> value of the **Continue** button on the final step for creating a user account.
trans-unit.target: Feltet ContinueButtonCommandName representerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>verdien for den **Fortsett** -knappen på det siste trinnet for å opprette en brukerkonto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: To assign continue functionality to any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property of the button to the string that is contained in the ContinueButtonCommandName field.
trans-unit.target: Å tilordne fortsette funksjonaliteten til alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>kontrollen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontrollere må du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>-egenskapen for knappen til streng som ligger i feltet ContinueButtonCommandName.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The **Continue** button appears on the template for the final step for creating a user account, which is represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den **Fortsett** -knappen på malen for det siste trinnet for å opprette en brukerkonto som representeres av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A>

trans-unit.source: Clicking the **Continue** button redirects the user to the URL that is stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du klikker den **Fortsett** knappen omdirigerer brukeren til URL-adressen som er lagret i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To add custom functionality to the **Continue** button, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Legge til egendefinert funksjonaliteten for å den **Fortsett** knappen, oppretter du en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonClick>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonClick>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image used for the **Continue** button on the final user account creation step.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et bilde som brukes for det **Fortsett** -knappen på endelig bruker kontoen oppretting trinn.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType>, use the ContinueButtonImageUrl property to specify the image to display for the **Continue** button.

trans-unit.source: The URL of an image used for the **Continue** button on the final user account creation step.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of the **Continue** button.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en samling med egenskaper som definerer hvordan de **Fortsett** knappen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property determines the appearance of the **Continue** button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, but you can override these settings using the ContinueButtonStyle property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen bestemmer utseendet til den **Fortsett** -knappen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll, men du kan overstyre disse innstillingene ved hjelp av ContinueButtonStyle-egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `ContinueButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi disse egenskapene deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` representerer en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>klasse (for eksempel `ContinueButtonStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ContinueButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `ContinueButtonStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger inkludere egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, tekstfargen og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the ContinueButtonStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Stilinnstillingene for egenskapen ContinueButtonStyle skal slås sammen med stilinnstillingene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the ContinueButtonStyle property override the corresponding settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Innstillinger brukes i egenskapen ContinueButtonStyle overstyre de tilsvarende innstillingene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by ContinueButtonStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the ContinueButtonStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Følgende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>stilegenskaper overstyres av ContinueButtonStyle innstillinger:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>imidlertid når du bruker maler for utseendet til å definere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll, ContinueButtonStyle egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.target: En referanse til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder egenskapene som definerer hvordan de **Fortsett** knappen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption displayed on the **Continue** button.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten teksten vises på den **Fortsett** knappen.

trans-unit.source: The ContinueButtonText property contains the text displayed for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control's **Continue** button.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ContinueButtonText inneholder teksten som vises for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontrollens **Fortsett** knappen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonType%2A> property, the ContinueButtonText property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image, or as the text of a link.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig av verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonType%2A>egenskapen egenskapen ContinueButtonText kan vises som tekst i en knapp som tekst som vises som et alternativ til et bilde eller teksten for en kobling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonType%2A> property values and their respective effects on the **Continue** button's text caption.
trans-unit.target: Følgende tabell lister <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonType%2A>egenskapsverdier og de respektive påvirker den **Fortsett** tittel for tekst for knappen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text caption displayed on the **Continue** button.
trans-unit.target: Teksten teksten vises på den **Fortsett** knappen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Continue".
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er "Fortsett".

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: Standardteksten for kontrollen er lokalisert basert på gjeldende nasjonale innstillinger for serveren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button rendered as the **Continue** button.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir knappen gjengis som den **Fortsett** knappen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified button type is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte knapp-typen er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page that the user will see after clicking the **Continue** button on the success page.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til siden som brukeren skal vises når du har klikket den **Fortsett** knappen på siden var vellykket.

trans-unit.source: The ContinueDestinationPageUrl property contains the URL of the Web page that the user will see after successfully completing registration on your site.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ContinueDestinationPageUrl inneholder URL-adresse for nettside som brukeren skal se etter å ha fullført registrering på området.

trans-unit.source: By setting the ContinueDestinationPageUrl property, you can control the first page that newly registered users see.
trans-unit.target: Ved å angi egenskapen ContinueDestinationPageUrl, kan du kontrollere den første siden som nylig er registrert brukere se.

trans-unit.source: When the ContinueDestinationPageUrl property is <xref:System.String> and the user clicks the **Continue** button, the page is refreshed and any values on the form are cleared.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen ContinueDestinationPageUrl er <xref:System.String>og brukeren klikker den **Fortsett** -knappen, siden blir oppdatert, og alle verdier i skjemaet tømmes.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the destination page.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen til siden.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Standard er <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Called by the ASP.NET page framework to notify this control to create any child controls that it contains in preparation for posting back or rendering.
trans-unit.target: Kalles av ASP.NET siden framework skal varsles kontrollen til å opprette en underordnet Kontroller den inneholder under forberedelsene for publisering tilbake eller gjengivelse.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the membership provider has created the new Web site user account.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når leverandøren av medlemskapet har opprettet den nye brukerkontoen for webområdet.

trans-unit.source: The CreatedUser event is raised after the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property creates the new Web site user account.
trans-unit.target: CreatedUser denne hendelsen oppstår etter leverandøren av medlemskapet som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>egenskapen oppretter den nye webområde-brukerkontoen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A> property is `true`, the user is logged on to the Web site after the CreatedUser event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>egenskapen `true`, brukeren er logget på webområdet etter hendelsen CreatedUser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the CreatedUser event to set Web site values, such as personalization values, before the user is logged on to the site for the first time.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CreatedUser-hendelsen for å angi webområdet verdier, for eksempel tilpassing verdier, før brukeren er logget på området for første gang.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified button type is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte knapp-typen er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the membership provider cannot create the specified user account.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når leverandøren av medlemskapet ikke kan opprette den angitte brukerkontoen.

trans-unit.source: The CreateUserError event is raised on the server when the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property fails to create the specified user account.
trans-unit.target: CreateUserError denne hendelsen oppstår på serveren når leverandøren av medlemskapet angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>egenskapen kan ikke opprette den angitte brukerkontoen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error handler is passed a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus> object that contains the details of the failure from the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Feil-behandlingsprogrammet er sendt en <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus>objekt som inneholder detaljer for feil fra leverandøren av medlemskapet.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus>

trans-unit.source: For a list of the possible error conditions, see <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus>.
trans-unit.target: En liste over mulige feil, kan du se <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus>.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the template for the user account creation step.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til malen for bruker kontoen oppretting trinn.

trans-unit.source: The CreateUserStep property defines the account creation step of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CreateUserStep definerer trinn for konto-oppretting av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep> object that CreateUserStep returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep>objektet CreateUserStep returnerer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the required and optional controls that are supported when using templated content for the CreateUserStep.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser nødvendige og valgfrie kontrollene som støttes ved bruk av organisasjonsapper innholdet for CreateUserStep.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> is set to `false`, no exception is thrown if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> control is not found.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>er satt til `false`, ingen unntak hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>kontrollen finnes ikke.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the control is of the wrong type, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen er av feil type, blir ignorert.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if a membership provider requires a question and answer (determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionAndAnswerRequired%2A> property), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> controls are required and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> throws an exception if they are not found or are of the wrong type.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte hvis en leverandør av medlemskap krever et spørsmål og svar (avhenger av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionAndAnswerRequired%2A>egenskapen), <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>Kontroller kreves og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>oppstår det et unntak hvis de ikke finnes eller er av feil type.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionAndAnswerRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: If they are not required by the membership provider, no exception is thrown if they are not found, and if they are of the wrong type they are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis de ikke kreves av Medlemskapsleverandøren, unntak ingen hvis de ikke finnes, og hvis de er av feil type de ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep"></xref> value that represents the user account creation step.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizardStep"> </xref> verdi som Representer bruker kontoen oppretting trinn.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the membership provider is called to create the new Web site user account.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer før leverandøren av medlemskapet kalles for å opprette nye webområdet brukerkontoen.

trans-unit.source: The CreatingUser event is raised prior to calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method on the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: CreatingUser denne hendelsen oppstår før du kaller den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>-metoden på leverandøren av medlemskapet som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the CreatingUser event to establish defaults or modify the information entered by the user before passing the information to the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Bruk hendelsen CreatingUser til å opprette standarder, eller endre informasjon som er angitt av brukeren før du sende informasjonen til leverandøren av medlemskapet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the new user should be allowed to log on to the Web site.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den nye brukeren skal få tillatelse til å logge på webområdet.

trans-unit.source: The DisableCreatedUser property determines if the newly created user account will be marked as disabled in the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DisableCreatedUser bestemmer hvis nyopprettede kontoen blir merket som deaktivert i datalageret medlemskap.

trans-unit.source: When user accounts are marked as disabled, the accounts are not allowed to log on to the Web site.
trans-unit.target: Når brukerkontoer er merket som deaktivert, kan kontoene ikke logge på webområdet.

trans-unit.source: For example, if your Web site allows new users to request an account, but requires administrative approval before allowing access, set the DisableCreatedUser property to `true` to disable newly created accounts until an administrator approves the account.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis webområdet tillater at nye brukere å be om en konto, men krever administrative godkjenning før du tillater tilgang, angi DisableCreatedUser egenskapen `true` til Deaktiver nyopprettede kontoer til en administrator godkjenner kontoen.

trans-unit.source: When DisableCreatedUser is `true`, you should set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A> property to `false` so that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> does not attempt to log on the new user.
trans-unit.target: Når DisableCreatedUser er `true`, bør du sette den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>egenskapen `false` slik at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>ikke prøver å logge på den nye brukeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the new user is allowed to log on to the Web site; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den nye brukeren kan logge på webområde. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
