trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et vanlig uttrykk som brukes til å validere den angitte e-postadressen.

trans-unit.source: Use the EmailRegularExpression property to specify a regular expression that validates the e-mail address entered by the user to confirm that it matches a specific pattern.
trans-unit.target: Bruk EmailRegularExpression-egenskapen til å angi et vanlig uttrykk validerer e-postadressen som er angitt av brukeren til å bekrefte at den samsvarer med en bestemt mønsteret.

trans-unit.source: A common use is to make sure that the user has entered a complete e-mail address, such as **user@contoso.com**.
trans-unit.target: Brukes for å kontrollere at brukeren har angitt en fullstendig e-postadresse som ** user@contoso.com **.

trans-unit.source: The regular expression is used in addition to any restrictions placed on the e-mail address by the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Det vanlige uttrykket som brukes i tillegg til eventuelle begrensninger som er plassert på e-postadressen av leverandøren av medlemskapet som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the membership provider rejects the e-mail address for any reason, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidEmailErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis leverandøren av medlemskapet avviser e-postadressen for alle årsak, teksten finnes i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidEmailErrorMessage%2A>egenskapen skal vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidEmailErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The address is only compared to the regular expression if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Adressen bare sammenlignet med det regulære uttrykket hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.RequireEmail%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the e-mail address does not pass the regular expression, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: Hvis e-postadressen ikke består det vanlige uttrykket, teksten finnes i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>egenskapen skal vises for brukeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the regular expression used to validate an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder det vanlige uttrykket som brukes til å validere en e-postadresse.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message displayed when the entered e-mail address does not pass the site's criteria for e-mail addresses.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir feilmeldingen som vises når den angitte e-postadressen ikke overføre områdets vilkår for e-postadresser.

trans-unit.source: Use the EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage property to inform the user that the e-mail address entered did not pass the site's criteria for e-mail addresses.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage å informere brukeren angav e-postadressen bestod ikke områdets vilkårene for e-postadresser.

trans-unit.source: The error message displayed when the entered e-mail address does not pass the regular expression defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpression*> property.
trans-unit.target: Feilmelding vises når den angitte e-postadressen ikke sende det vanlige uttrykket som er definert i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpression*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpression*>

trans-unit.source: The default is "Please enter a different e-mail address."
trans-unit.target: Standard er "Angi en annen e-postadresse."

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: Standardteksten for kontrollen er lokalisert basert på gjeldende nasjonale innstillinger for serveren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message shown to the user when an e-mail address is not entered in the e-mail text box.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir feilmeldingen som vises for brukeren når en e-postadresse ikke er angitt i tekstboksen e-post.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The error message shown to the user when an e-mail address is not entered in the e-mail text box.
trans-unit.target: Feilmelding som vises for brukeren når en e-postadresse ikke er angitt i tekstboksen e-post.

trans-unit.source: The default value is "E-mail is required."
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er "E-post er nødvendig."

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: Standardteksten for kontrollen er lokalisert basert på gjeldende nasjonale innstillinger for serveren.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of style properties that define the appearance of error messages.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en samling med egenskaper som definerer utseendet av feilmeldinger.

trans-unit.source: Use the ErrorMessageStyle property to change the appearance of error messages that are displayed when the membership provider fails to create a new user account.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ErrorMessageStyle-egenskapen til å endre utseendet av feilmeldingene som vises når Medlemskapsleverandøren kan ikke opprette en ny konto.

trans-unit.source: By default, the ErrorMessageStyle is set to display the following messages in red: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DuplicateEmailErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DuplicateUserNameErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidAnswerErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidEmailErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidQuestionErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidPasswordErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UnknownErrorMessage%2A> The ErrorMessageStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i ErrorMessageStyle er satt til å vise følgende meldinger med rødt:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DuplicateEmailErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DuplicateUserNameErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidAnswerErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidEmailErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidQuestionErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidPasswordErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UnknownErrorMessage%2A>for ErrorMessageStyle-egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet; du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UnknownErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidPasswordErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidQuestionErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidEmailErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidAnswerErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DuplicateUserNameErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DuplicateEmailErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `ErrorMessageStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi disse egenskapene deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` representerer en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>klasse (for eksempel `ErrorMessageStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ErrorMessageStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `ErrorMessageStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger inkludere egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, tekstfargen og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the ErrorMessageStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Stilinnstillingene for egenskapen ErrorMessageStyle skal slås sammen med stilinnstillingene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Any settings that are applied in the ErrorMessageStyle property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Innstillinger som er brukt i egenskapen ErrorMessageStyle overstyrer tilsvarende i egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by ErrorMessageStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the ErrorMessageStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Følgende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>stilegenskaper overstyres av ErrorMessageStyle innstillinger:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>imidlertid når du bruker maler for utseendet til å definere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll, ErrorMessageStyle egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> containing the style properties that define the appearance of error messages on the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som inneholder stilegenskaper som definerer utseendet av feilmeldinger kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is null.
trans-unit.target: Standard er null.

trans-unit.target: Ingen

trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of properties that define the appearance of hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en samling med egenskaper som definerer utseendet til hyperkoblinger.

trans-unit.source: The HyperLinkStyle property gets a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that you use to change the appearance of hyperlinks in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HyperLinkStyle henter en referanse til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt du bruker for å endre utseendet til hyperkoblingene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The HyperLinkStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HyperLinkStyle er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `HyperLinkStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi disse egenskapene deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` representerer en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>klasse (for eksempel `HyperLinkStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HyperLinkStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `HyperLinkStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the HyperLinkStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Stilinnstillingene for egenskapen HyperLinkStyle skal slås sammen med stilinnstillingene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the HyperLinkStyle property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Innstillinger brukes i egenskapen HyperLinkStyle overstyrer tilsvarende i egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by HyperLinkStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the HyperLinkStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Følgende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>stilegenskaper overstyres av HyperLinkStyle innstillinger:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>imidlertid når du bruker maler for utseendet til å definere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll, HyperLinkStyle egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains properties that define the appearance of hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som inneholder egenskaper som definerer utseendet til hyperkoblinger.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets instructions for creating a new user account.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir instruksjoner for å opprette en ny konto.

trans-unit.source: The InstructionText property contains instructions for users creating a new user account.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen InstructionText inneholder instruksjoner for brukere som oppretter en ny konto.

trans-unit.source: This text is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, following the title.
trans-unit.target: Denne teksten vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontrollen følgende tittelen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: If the InstructionText property is set to an empty string (""), no instruction text is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen InstructionText er satt til en tom streng (""), ingen instruksjon melding til brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The instruction text for creating a new user account.
trans-unit.target: Instruksjon teksten for å opprette en ny konto.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of instruction text.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en samling med egenskaper som definerer instruksjon tekstvisning.

trans-unit.source: The InstructionTextStyle property defines the appearance of instruction text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen InstructionTextStyle definerer utseendet til instruksjonstekst i det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet som returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `InstructionTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi disse egenskapene deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` representerer en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>klasse (for eksempel `InstructionTextStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `InstructionTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `InstructionTextStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: The InstructionTextStyle property defines the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen InstructionTextStyle definerer hvordan de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionText%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InstructionText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the InstructionTextStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Stilinnstillingene for egenskapen InstructionTextStyle skal slås sammen med stilinnstillingene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the InstructionTextStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Innstillinger brukes i egenskapen InstructionTextStyle overstyrer tilsvarende i egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by InstructionTextStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the InstructionTextStyle property has no effect.

trans-unit.source: The actual requirements for the answer are determined by the membership provider, and might be different for different providers.
trans-unit.target: De faktiske kravene for svaret bestemmes av leverandøren av medlemskapet og kan være forskjellig for ulike innholdsleverandører.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of labels.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en samling med egenskaper som definerer utseendet av etiketter.

trans-unit.source: The LabelStyle property defines the appearance of labels in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen LabelStyle definerer utseendet for etikettene på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet som returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `LabelStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi disse egenskapene deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` representerer en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>klasse (for eksempel `LabelStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `LabelStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `LabelStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: The LabelStyle property defines the appearance of the following properties: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailLabelText%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserNameLabelText%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordLabelText%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPasswordLabelText%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionLabelText%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AnswerLabelText%2A> The style settings for the LabelStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen LabelStyle definerer utseendet til følgende egenskaper:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailLabelText%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserNameLabelText%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordLabelText%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPasswordLabelText%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionLabelText%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AnswerLabelText%2A>stilinnstillingene for egenskapen LabelStyle skal slås sammen med stilinnstillingene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AnswerLabelText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionLabelText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPasswordLabelText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordLabelText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserNameLabelText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailLabelText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the LabelStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Innstillinger brukes i egenskapen LabelStyle overstyrer tilsvarende i egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by LabelStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the LabelStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Følgende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>stilegenskaper overstyres av LabelStyle innstillinger:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>imidlertid når du bruker maler for utseendet til å definere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll, LabelStyle egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains properties that define the appearance of labels.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som inneholder egenskaper som definerer utseendet av etiketter.

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the SaveViewState method.
trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretter visningsstatus informasjon fra en tidligere sideforespørsel som er lagret av SaveViewState-metoden.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the control state to restore.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer den kontroll tilstanden til å gjenopprette.

trans-unit.source: savedState is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: savedStateer ikke et gyldig .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to log in the new user after creating the user account.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om å logge på den nye brukeren når du har opprettet av brukerkontoen.

trans-unit.source: The LoginCreatedUser property can be set to `false` if you want to create a user account but not authenticate the account after it is created.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen LoginCreatedUser kan settes til `false` Hvis du vil opprette en brukerkonto, men ikke godkjenne kontoen når den er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: This might be useful if you are an administrator creating user accounts, for example, or if there is a waiting period before users can access the Web site.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være nyttig hvis du er administrator for å opprette brukerkontoer, for eksempel, eller hvis det er en ventetiden før brukere kan få tilgang til webområdet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the LoginCreatedUser property is set to `true`, the user will be created and logged in at the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A> step.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når det LoginCreatedUser er satt til `true`, brukeren blir opprettet og pålogget på slutten av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>trinn.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the user to be logged in after all the steps have been completed, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A> property to `false` until all of the steps of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control are completed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil at brukeren er logget inn alle trinnene er fullført, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A>egenskapen `false` før alle trinnene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontrollen er fullført.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisableCreatedUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the new user should be logged in after creating the user account; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den nye brukeren må være logget på når du har opprettet av brukerkontoen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the characteristics of the e-mail message sent to new users.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en samling med egenskaper som definerer egenskaper i e-postmeldingen sendes til nye brukere.

trans-unit.source: The MailDefinition property returns a reference to a group of properties that you use to define the format and content of the e-mail message that is sent to new users.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen MailDefinition returnerer en referanse til en gruppe som du bruker til å definere formatet og innholdet i e-postmeldingen som sendes til nye brukere.

trans-unit.source: Common settings include the subject line and the sender's return address.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger inkluderer emnelinjen og Avsenderens postadresse for avsender.

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of properties, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> class.
trans-unit.target: En fullstendig liste over egenskaper, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>

trans-unit.source: The MailDefinition property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen MailDefinition er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>

trans-unit.source: You can set the MailDefinition properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> class (for example, `MailDefinition-Subject`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapene MailDefinition deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` representerer en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>klasse (for eksempel `MailDefinition-Subject`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.SubProperty` (for example, `MailDefinition.Subject`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi egenskapene programmatisk formatet `Property.SubProperty` (for eksempel `MailDefinition.Subject`).

trans-unit.source: An e-mail message is sent to new users only if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> is not `null` and if <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage.Body%2A> is not empty or `null`.
trans-unit.target: En e-postmeldingen er sendt til nye brukere bare hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>ikke `null` og hvis <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage.Body%2A>er tom eller `null`.</xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage.Body%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail> event is raised and an attempt is made to send the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail>denne hendelsen oppstår og er gjort forsøk på å sende e-postmeldingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From%2A> property must be set to an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From%2A>egenskapen må angis som en e-postadresse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Ellers en <xref:System.Web.HttpException>unntak.</xref:System.Web.HttpException>

trans-unit.source: When the e-mail message is created from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object, it will make the substitutions listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Når e-postmeldingen er opprettet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>objektet, det vil gjøre endringer som er oppført i tabellen nedenfor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>

trans-unit.source: |Substitution text|Replaced with| |-----------------------|-------------------| |`<%UserName%>`|The user name of the newly created user account.| |`<%Password%>`|The password for the newly created user account.| If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.IsBodyHtml%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object is `true`, the contents of the mail message will be HTML encoded to guard against cross-site scripting security vulnerabilities for the message recipient.
trans-unit.target: | Erstatning tekst | Erstattet med | |-----------------------|-------------------| | `<%UserName%>`| Brukernavnet for nyopprettede brukerkontoen. | | `<%Password%>`| Passordet for nyopprettede brukerkontoen. | Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.IsBodyHtml%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>objektet er `true`, innholdet i e-postmelding blir HTML-kodede for å beskytte mot tvers skripting sikkerhetsproblemer for mottakeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.IsBodyHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A> method to modify the <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A>metode for å endre den <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>opprettet av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> </xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.OnSendingMail%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Det er ikke mulig å garantere at brukeren vil motta eller vise en e-postmelding.

trans-unit.source: To verify that a user has received a notification by e-mail, consider providing a confirmation link in the e-mail message that enables the user to confirm that the notification was received.
trans-unit.target: For å bekrefte at en bruker har mottatt en varsling via e-post, bør du vurdere å gi en bekreftelse koblingen i e-postmeldingen som lar brukeren å bekrefte at meldingen ble mottatt.

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition"></xref> object that defines the e-mail message sent to a new user.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition"> </xref> -objekt som definerer e-postmeldingen sendes til en ny bruker.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From*> is not set to an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From*>er ikke satt til en e-postadresse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.From*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the membership provider called to create user accounts.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Medlemskapsleverandøren for å opprette brukerkontoer.

trans-unit.source: The MembershipProvider property contains the name of the defined <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> class membership provider that is used to store the user information.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen MembershipProvider inneholder navnet på den definerte <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>klassen Medlemskapsleverandøren som brukes til å lagre brukerinformasjonen.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: You can store membership information for users in different data stores by changing the value of the MembershipProvider property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lagre informasjon om gruppemedlemskap for brukere i ulike butikker ved å endre verdien for egenskapen MembershipProvider.

trans-unit.source: When the MembershipProvider property is set to <xref:System.String.Empty>, the default membership provider defined in the Web.config file is used.
trans-unit.target: Når MembershipProvider-egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.String.Empty>, brukes medlemskap standardleverandøren definert i Web.config-filen.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: Membership providers are defined in the Web.config file in the `<membership>` section.
trans-unit.target: Medlemskap leverandører er definert i Web.config-filen i den `<membership>` delen.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> used to create user accounts.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>brukes til å opprette brukerkontoer.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Standard er <xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: The specified membership provider is not defined in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte Medlemskapsleverandøren er ikke definert i Web.config-filen.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the server control is passed up the page's UI server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om hendelsen for serverkontrollen som er sendt sidens Brukergrensesnittet server kontrollen hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Ingen

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Ingen

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: En boolsk verdi.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonClick"></xref> event when the user clicks the **Continue** button on the final user account creation step.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonClick"> </xref> -hendelse når brukeren klikker den **Fortsett** -knappen på endelig bruker kontoen oppretting trinn.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonClick> event is raised when the user clicks the **Continue** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonClick>denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren klikker den **Fortsett** -knappen på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ContinueButtonClick>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnContinueButtonClick method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnContinueButtonClick kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatedUser"></xref> event after the membership provider creates the user account.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatedUser"> </xref> hendelsen når leverandøren av medlemskapet oppretter brukerkontoen.

trans-unit.source: The OnCreatedUser method is called after the Web site user account is created by the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnCreatedUser kalles når webområdet brukerkontoen din er opprettet av Medlemskapsleverandøren.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A> property is `true`, the user is logged in after the OnCreatedUser method is called.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>egenskapen `true`, brukeren er logget på når metoden OnCreatedUser kalles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.LoginCreatedUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the OnCreatedUser method to set Web site values, such as personalization properties, before the user is logged in for the first time.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden OnCreatedUser for å angi webområdet verdier, for eksempel tilpassing egenskapene før brukeren er logget på for første gang.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnCreatedUser method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnCreatedUser kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError"></xref> event when there is a problem creating the specified user account.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError"> </xref> -hendelse når det er et problem under oppretting av den angitte brukerkontoen.

trans-unit.source: The OnCreateUserError method is called when the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property returns an error message from creating the specified user account.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnCreateUserError kalles når leverandøren av medlemskapet angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>egenskapen returnerer feilmeldingen fra oppretting av den angitte brukerkontoen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs.CreateUserError%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter contains a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus> object that contains the details of the error.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs.CreateUserError%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs>objekt sendt som den `e` parameteren inneholder en <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus>objekt som inneholder detaljer om feilen.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs.CreateUserError%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Metoden OnCreateUserError kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs"></xref> with the data for the event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs"> </xref> med dataene for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser"></xref> event prior to calling the membership provider to create the new user account.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser"> </xref> hendelsen før du kaller Medlemskapsleverandøren for å opprette nye brukerkonto.

trans-unit.source: Use the OnCreatingUser method to do any processing required before sending the new user information to the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method of the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruker metoden OnCreatingUser noen kreves før du sender brukerinformasjonen til behandling av <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>-metoden til leverandøren av medlemskapet som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might set the user name field to all lowercase letters, or compare the e-mail address to a list of restricted addresses before allowing creation of the user account.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel angi brukernavn-feltet for alle små bokstaver, eller sammenligne e-postadressen til en liste over begrensede adresser før oppretting av brukerkontoen.

trans-unit.source: If you need to cancel the request to create the new user account, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte forespørselen om å opprette nye brukerkontoen må du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs>objekt sendt som den `e` parameter `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.target: Finner ikke leverandøren av medlemskapet for siden.

trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.Providers%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail"></xref> event before an e-mail message is sent to a new user.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendingMail"> </xref> hendelsen før en e-postmeldingen er sendt til en ny bruker.

trans-unit.source: Use the OnSendingMail method to modify the e-mail message sent to new users.
trans-unit.target: Bruk OnSendingMail-metoden til å endre e-postmeldingen sendes til nye brukere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs.Message%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter contains the <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> object that will be sent to the new user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs.Message%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs>objekt sendt som den `e` parameteren inneholder den <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>objektet som vil bli sendt til den nye brukeren.</xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: Modify the properties of the <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage> object to modify the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Endre egenskaper for det <xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>objekt for å endre e-postmeldingen.</xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage>

trans-unit.source: E-mail messages are only created when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> object specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> property points to a valid file name.
trans-unit.target: E-postmeldinger opprettes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>objektet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>egenskapen peker til et gyldig filnavn.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A>

trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Metoden OnSendingMail kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs"></xref> containing the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailMessageEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendMailError"></xref> event when e-mail cannot be sent to the new user.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.SendMailError"> </xref> -hendelse når e-post ikke kan sendes til den nye brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The OnSendMailError method is called when the SMTP mail system raises an exception while attempting to send e-mail to the new user.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnSendMailError kalles når SMTP-e-postsystem viser et unntak under forsøk på å sende e-post til den nye brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter to determine the actual cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: Undersøk den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>objekt sendt som den `e` parameter for å fastsette faktiske årsaken til unntaket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: The most common problem is a configuration error in the `<smtpMail>` section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: Vanligste problemet er en konfigurasjonsfeil i den `<smtpMail>` -delen i Web.config-filen.

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object passed as the `e` parameter to signal that the exception that caused the OnSendMailError method to be called has been taken care of, otherwise the exception is re-thrown.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>objekt sendt som den `e` parameteren til å varsle som unntak som forårsaket metoden OnSendMailError kalles har blitt tatt hånd om, ellers unntaket er på nytt thrown.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnSendMailError method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnSendMailError kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs"></xref> containing the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Gets the password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: Henter passord ble angitt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The Password property contains the password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen passordet inneholder passord ble angitt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator> object is provided for the Password and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A> text box values.
trans-unit.target: Som standard et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>objekt er angitt for passordet og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A>for tekstverdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>

trans-unit.source: Each text box displayed on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control also has a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RequiredFieldValidator> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Hver tekstboks vises på <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontrollen har også et <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RequiredFieldValidator>objekt som er tilknyttet.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.RequiredFieldValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: Passordet ble angitt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of the text that describes password requirements.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en samling med egenskaper som definerer utseendet til tekst som beskriver passordkrav.

trans-unit.source: The PasswordHintStyle property defines the appearance of the text that describes password requirements in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen PasswordHintStyle definerer utseendet på teksten som beskriver passordkravene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet som returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `PasswordHintStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi disse egenskapene deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` representerer en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>klasse (for eksempel `PasswordHintStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PasswordHintStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `PasswordHintStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: The PasswordHintStyle property defines the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen PasswordHintStyle definerer hvordan de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintText%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordHintText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the PasswordHintStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Stilinnstillingene for egenskapen PasswordHintStyle skal slås sammen med stilinnstillingene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the PasswordHintStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Innstillinger brukes i egenskapen PasswordHintStyle overstyrer tilsvarende i egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by PasswordHintStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the PasswordHintStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Følgende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>stilegenskaper overstyres av PasswordHintStyle innstillinger:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>imidlertid når du bruker maler for utseendet til å definere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll, PasswordHintStyle egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains properties that define the appearance of the text that describes password requirements.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som inneholder egenskaper som definerer utseendet til tekst som beskriver passordkrav.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that describes password requirements.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som beskriver passordkrav.

trans-unit.source: You can use the PasswordHintText property to provide guidelines and requirements for the user on how to create a password.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen PasswordHintText til å gi retningslinjer og krav til brukeren på hvordan du oppretter et passord.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could set the PasswordHintText property to "Your password must be at least six characters long."
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel ikke angi egenskapen PasswordHintText "passordet må ha minst seks tegn."

trans-unit.source: You can then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression%2A> property to validate that the user entered a password that conforms to the guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Deretter kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression%2A>til å bekrefte at brukeren oppgav et passord som samsvarer med retningslinjene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The text of the label for the password text box.
trans-unit.target: Teksten for etiketten for tekstboksen passord.

trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er "passord:".

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: Standardteksten for kontrollen er lokalisert basert på gjeldende nasjonale innstillinger for serveren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a regular expression used to validate the provided password.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et vanlig uttrykk som brukes til å validere det angitte passordet.

trans-unit.source: Use the PasswordRegularExpression property to define the requirements for passwords used to validate users on your Web site.
trans-unit.target: Bruk PasswordRegularExpression-egenskapen til å definere kravene til passord som brukes til å godkjenne brukere på webområdet.

trans-unit.source: A common use is to make sure that a user has included symbols other than letters in a password to make it harder for attackers to guess a password.
trans-unit.target: Brukes for eksempel å være sikker på at en bruker har inkludert symboler enn bokstaver i et passord for å gjøre det vanskeligere for angriper å gjette et passord.

trans-unit.source: The regular expression is used in addition to any restrictions placed on the password by the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Det vanlige uttrykket som brukes i tillegg til eventuelle begrensninger som er plassert på passordet av leverandøren av medlemskapet som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the membership provider rejects the password for any reason, the text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidPasswordErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis leverandøren av medlemskapet avviser passordet for en hvilken som helst årsak, teksten finnes i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidPasswordErrorMessage%2A>egenskapen skal vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.InvalidPasswordErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the password entered does not pass the regular expression, the error message contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> property is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det angitte passordet ikke består det vanlige uttrykket, feilmeldingen finnes i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>egenskapen skal vises for brukeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the regular expression used to validate the provided password.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder det vanlige uttrykket som brukes til å validere det angitte passordet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message shown when the password entered does not conform to the site's password requirements.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir feilmeldingen som vises når passordet ikke med kravene områdets passord.

trans-unit.source: Use the PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage property to inform the user that the password entered did not conform to the site's password requirements.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage å informere brukeren oppgav passordet samsvarer ikke med kravene for områdets passord.

trans-unit.source: The error message shown when the password entered does not pass the regular expression defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression*> property.
trans-unit.target: Feilmeldingen som vises når passordet ikke sende det vanlige uttrykket som er definert i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpression*>

trans-unit.source: The default is "Please enter a different password."
trans-unit.target: Standard er "Skriv inn et annet passord."

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: Standardteksten for kontrollen er lokalisert basert på gjeldende nasjonale innstillinger for serveren.

trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er "Passord kreves."

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir gjenoppretting bekreftelse passordspørsmålet angitt av brukeren.

trans-unit.target: Leverandøren av medlemskapet som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>bestemme om spørsmålet og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>tekstbokser skal vises på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.target: Hver tekstboks vises på <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontrollen har en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>tilknyttet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretting av bekreftelse passordspørsmålet angitt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user is required to enter a password confirmation question and answer.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om brukeren må oppgi et passord for bekreftelse spørsmål og svar.

trans-unit.source: The QuestionAndAnswerRequired property returns a value from the membership provider set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property specifying whether the user is required to enter a password confirmation question and answer.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen QuestionAndAnswerRequired returnerer en verdi fra leverandøren av medlemskapet som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>egenskap som angir om brukeren må oppgi et passord for bekreftelse spørsmål og svar.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a Membership provider requires a question and answer, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> controls are required and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> throws an exception if they are not found or of the wrong type.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en leverandør av medlemskap krever et spørsmål og svar, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>Kontroller kreves og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>oppstår det et unntak hvis de ikke blir funnet eller er av feil type.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A>

trans-unit.source: If they are not required by the Membership provider, no exception is thrown if they are not found, and if they are of the wrong type they are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis de ikke kreves av leverandøren medlemskap, unntak ingen hvis de ikke finnes, og hvis de er av feil type de ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is required to enter a password confirmation question and answer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren må oppgi et passord for bekreftelse spørsmål og svar; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
