trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an e-mail address is required for the Web site user.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en e-postadresse er nødvendig for webområdet bruker.

trans-unit.source: When the RequireEmail property is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> will display a text box and an associated label for the user to enter an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen posten er `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>viser en tekstboks og en tilknyttet etikett for brukeren må oppgi en e-postadresse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: If the user does not enter an e-mail address, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A> property will display an error message.
trans-unit.target: Hvis brukeren ikke har angitt en e-postadresse i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A>egenskapen vises en feilmelding.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the RequireEmail property is set to `true` and you are using templated content, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> control is required and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> throws an exception if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> control is not found or is of the wrong type.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen posten er satt til `true` og bruker organisasjonsapper innhold i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>kontrollen er obligatorisk og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>oppstår et unntak hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>kontrollen finnes ikke eller er av feil type.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>

trans-unit.source: If RequireEmail is set to `false`, no exception is thrown if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A> is not found.
trans-unit.target: Hvis posten er satt til `false`, ingen unntak hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>finnes ikke.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Email%2A>

trans-unit.source: If it is of the wrong type, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er av feil type, blir ignorert.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property requires a unique e-mail address for new users, you must set the RequireEmail property to `true` so that the UI for entering an e-mail address is displayed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis leverandøren av medlemskapet angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>egenskapen krever en unik e-postadresse for nye brukere, må du sette egenskapen posten til `true` slik at Brukergrensesnittet for å angi en e-postadresse vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the user will see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A> but have no way to enter an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, brukeren ser den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A>, men er ikke mulig å angi en e-postadresse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an e-mail address is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en e-postadresse er påkrevd. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Saves any state that was modified after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*> method was invoked.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer en tilstand som ble endret etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*>metoden ble startet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the current view state of the control; otherwise, if there is no view state associated with the control, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder gjeldende visningsstatusen for kontrollen. Ellers, hvis det er ingen visningsstatusen som er knyttet til kontrollen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the user is sent an e-mail confirmation that an account has been created.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer før brukeren sendes en e-postbekreftelse en konto som er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> class will send an e-mail message confirming that a new Web site account has been created when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> property defines an e-mail message to send.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>klassen sender en e-postmelding bekrefter at en ny konto for webområdet har blitt opprettet når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A>definerer en e-postmelding til å sende.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MailDefinition%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Because the e-mail message only has automatic replacement fields for the user name and password fields, you can use the SendingMail event to modify the e-mail message before it is sent to the new user.
trans-unit.target: Fordi e-postmeldingen har bare automatisk erstatning for brukernavnet og passordfelt, kan du bruke hendelsen SendingMail for å endre e-postmeldingen før den sendes til den nye brukeren.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when there is an SMTP error sending e-mail to the new user.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når det er en SMTP-feil sende e-post til den nye brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The SendMailError event is raised when there is a problem using the SMTP mail provider to send e-mail to the e-mail address provided by the new user.
trans-unit.target: SendMailError hendelsen oppstår når det er et problem ved hjelp av leverandøren for SMTP-e-post til å sende e-post til e-postadressen som er angitt av den nye brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The most common reason to raise this event is when the `<smtpMail>` section of the Web.config file is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Det er den vanligste årsaken til denne hendelsen å øke når den `<smtpMail>` -delen i Web.config-filen er feil.

trans-unit.source: The default SendMailError event handler does not catch or handle the SMTP error from the e-mail system.
trans-unit.target: Standard SendMailError hendelsesbehandlingen ikke faktisk eller behandle SMTP-feil fra e-postsystem.

trans-unit.source: Your SendMailError event handler must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> object to `true` in order to stop the error from appearing to the Web site user.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen SendMailError må angis i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs>objekt `true` for å stoppe feil vises for brukeren for webområdet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SendMailErrorEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Sets design-time data for a control.
trans-unit.target: Angir utformingen-data for en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> containing the design-time data for the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>som inneholder utformingen dataene for kontrollen.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that is used to render alternate text that notifies screen readers to skip the sidebar area's content.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som brukes til å gjengi alternativ tekst som varsler skjermlesere å hoppe over området Sidepanel innhold.

trans-unit.source: Use the SkipLinkText property to specify the alternate text for a hidden-image read by screen readers that will provide the ability to skip the sidebar area's content.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SkipLinkText-egenskapen til å angi alternativ tekst for et skjult-bilde lese skjermen lesere som gir mulighet til å hoppe over området Sidepanel innhold.

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the hidden image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: Teksten du angir gir hjelpefunksjoner enheter med en beskrivelse av skjulte bildet som kan brukes til å gjøre kontrollen mer tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisplaySideBar%2A> property is set to `false` (the default), the SkipLinkText property does not create a hidden image with alternate text.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>er satt til `false` (standard), egenskapen SkipLinkText oppretter ikke et skjult bilde med alternativ tekst.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SkipLinkText property works only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisplaySideBar%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SkipLinkText fungerer bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"></xref> renders as alternate text with an invisible image, as a hint to screen readers.
trans-unit.target: En streng som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"> </xref> blir gjengitt som alternativ tekst med et usynlig bilde som en referanse til skjermlesere.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of text box controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en samling med egenskaper som definerer utseendet til tekstbokser.

trans-unit.source: The TextBoxStyle property defines the appearance of text box controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen TextBoxStyle definerer utseendet til tekst for kontroller i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objektet som returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi disse egenskapene deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` representerer en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>klasse (for eksempel `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: The TextBoxStyle property defines the appearance of the following text box controls: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A> text box field - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A> text box field - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A> text box field - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> text box field - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> text box field The style settings for the TextBoxStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen TextBoxStyle definerer utseendet til følgende tekst for kontroller:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>tekstboksen - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A>tekstboksen - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A>tekstboksen - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A>tekstboksen - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A>tekstboksen: stilinnstillingene for egenskapen TextBoxStyle skal slås sammen med stilinnstillingene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Answer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Question%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPassword%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.Password%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the TextBoxStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Innstillinger brukes i egenskapen TextBoxStyle overstyrer tilsvarende i egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by TextBoxStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the TextBoxStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Følgende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>stilegenskaper overstyres av TextBoxStyle innstillinger:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>imidlertid når du bruker maler for utseendet til å definere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll, TextBoxStyle egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains properties that define the appearance of text box controls.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder egenskaper som definerer utseendet til tekstbokser.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of titles.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en samling med egenskaper som definerer utseendet til titlene.

trans-unit.source: The TitleTextStyle property defines the appearance of titles in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen TitleTextStyle definerer utseendet til titler i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet som returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> class (for example, `TitleTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi disse egenskapene deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` representerer en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>klasse (for eksempel `TitleTextStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TitleTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `TitleTextStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: The TitleTextStyle property defines the appearance of the title on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A> step and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A> step.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen TitleTextStyle angir utseendet til tittelen på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>trinn og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A>trinn.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CompleteStep%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserStep%2A>

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the TitleTextStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Stilinnstillingene for egenskapen TitleTextStyle skal slås sammen med stilinnstillingene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the TitleTextStyle property override the corresponding settings in properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Innstillinger brukes i egenskapen TitleTextStyle overstyrer tilsvarende i egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by TitleTextStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the TitleTextStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Følgende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>stilegenskaper overstyres av TitleTextStyle innstillinger:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>imidlertid når du bruker maler for utseendet til å definere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll, TitleTextStyle egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains properties that define the appearance of titles.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som inneholder egenskaper som definerer utseendet til titlene.

trans-unit.source: Marks the starting point to begin tracking changes to the control as part of the control viewstate.
trans-unit.target: Merker utgangspunkt for å begynne å spore endringer til kontrollen som en del av visningsstatus kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message displayed when an error returned by the membership provider is not defined.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir feilmeldingen som vises når en feil ble returnert av leverandøren av medlemskapet ikke er definert.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The error message displayed when an error returned by the membership provider is not defined.
trans-unit.target: Feilmelding vises når en feil ble returnert av leverandøren av medlemskapet er ikke definert.

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Your account was not created.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er "kontoen ikke ble opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Please try again."
trans-unit.target: Prøv på nytt."

trans-unit.source: The default text of the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: Standardteksten kontrollens er lokalisert basert på gjeldende nasjonale innstillinger for serveren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir brukernavn som er angitt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: If a user name is required by the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A> property, then the user name text box will appear on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et brukernavn kreves av leverandøren av medlemskapet som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>egenskapen og tekstboksen bruker vises på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each text box displayed on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Hver tekstboks vises på <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontrollen har et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>objekt som er tilknyttet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The user name entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: Brukernavn som er angitt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the label for the user name text box.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten for etiketten for tekstboksen brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text of the label for the user name text box.
trans-unit.target: Teksten for etiketten for tekstboksen brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The default value is "User Name:".
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er "brukernavnet:".

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: Standardteksten for kontrollen er lokalisert basert på gjeldende nasjonale innstillinger for serveren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message displayed when the user name text box is left blank.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir feilmeldingen som vises når teksten brukernavnboksen er tom.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The error message displayed when the user name text box is left blank.
trans-unit.target: Feilmelding vises når teksten brukernavnboksen er tom.

trans-unit.source: The default value is "User Name is required."
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er "Brukernavn er nødvendig."

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.
trans-unit.target: Standardteksten for kontrollen er lokalisert basert på gjeldende nasjonale innstillinger for serveren.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the validation error messages.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til valideringen feilmeldinger.

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidatorTextStyle property to change the appearance of messages that are displayed for input validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ValidatorTextStyle-egenskapen til å endre utseendet av meldinger som vises for inndata valideringsfeil.

trans-unit.source: By default, the ValidatorTextStyle is set to display the following messages in red: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionRequiredErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AnswerRequiredErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserNameRequiredErrorMessage%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> The ValidatorTextStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i ValidatorTextStyle er satt til å vise følgende meldinger med rødt:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionRequiredErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AnswerRequiredErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserNameRequiredErrorMessage%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A>for ValidatorTextStyle-egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet; du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.UserNameRequiredErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRegularExpressionErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.ConfirmPasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.PasswordRequiredErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.AnswerRequiredErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.QuestionRequiredErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.EmailRequiredErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `ValidatorTextStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi disse egenskapene deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` representerer en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>klasse (for eksempel `ValidatorTextStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ValidatorTextStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `ValidatorTextStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger inkludere egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, tekstfargen og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the ValidatorTextStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Stilinnstillingene for egenskapen ValidatorTextStyle skal slås sammen med stilinnstillingene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: Any settings applied in the ValidatorTextStyle property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Innstillinger brukes i egenskapen ValidatorTextStyle overstyrer tilsvarende i egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> style properties are overridden by ValidatorTextStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control, the ValidatorTextStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Følgende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>stilegenskaper overstyres av ValidatorTextStyle innstillinger:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>imidlertid når du bruker maler for utseendet til å definere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll, ValidatorTextStyle egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> containing the style properties that define the appearance of validation error messages on the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder stilegenskaper som definerer utseendet til feilmeldinger kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is null.
trans-unit.target: Standard er null.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection containing all the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> objects defined for the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til en samling som inneholder alle de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref> objekter som er definert for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The WizardSteps property returns a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects that make up the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen WizardSteps returnerer en samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>objektene som utgjør det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: You can use the WizardSteps collection to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke WizardSteps-samlingen for å programmatisk tilgang av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>objekter i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A> methods to programmatically manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A>metoder for å endre programmatisk den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>objekter i samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"></xref> representing all the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> objects defined for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection"> </xref> som representerer alle de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref> objekter som er definert den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard"> </xref> kontrollen.
